metadata.title: CVE-2018-10982 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (unexpectedly high interrupt number,array overrun, and hypervisor crash) or possibly gain hypervisor privilegesby setting up an HPET timer to deliver interrupts in IO-APIC mode, akavHPET interrupt injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10982` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
